More info on the mailing lists.

I should write more about the Simple MPM, but ApacheCon New Orleans isÂ  coming up next week, so I want to try to get more of the code in before then, since traditionally coding during the conference never works out, and I’ll try to write up a blog post about why its cool sometime next week during the conference.
